original_text: I tell you this: When you were young, you put on your own clothes. Then you went to any place that you wanted to visit. But when you are old, it will be different. You will hold out your arms and someone else will tie your clothes for you. Then they will take you to a place where you do not want to go.’
korean_text: 내가 진실로 진실로 네게 이르노니 네가 젊어서는 스스로 띠 띠고 원하는 곳으로 다녔거니와 늙어서는 네 팔을 벌리리니 남이 네게 띠 띠우고 원하지 아니하는 곳으로 데려가리라

sentences.original_text: you put on your own clothes.
Then you went to any place
You will hold out your arms
and someone else will tie your clothes for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람이 네게 옷을 입게 하고,
네가 원하지 않는 곳으로 너를 데려가리라

sentences.original_text: to a place where you do not want to go.'
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 원하지 않는 곳으로 너를 데려가리라
